mapper.select: SELECT responseMate AS mateId, user.userName AS mateName, mate.status AS status FROM mate LEFT JOIN user ON mate.responseMate = user.userId WHERE requestMate = #{userId} UNION SELECT requestMate AS mateId, user.userName AS mateName, mate.status AS status FROM mate LEFT JOIN user ON mate.requestMate = user.userId WHERE responseMate = #{userId} ORDER BY FIELD(status, 'n', 'x', 'y')
SELECT * FROM mate WHERE requestMate=#{reqDto.userId} AND responseMate=#{reqDto.mateId} UNION SELECT * FROM mate WHERE requestMate=#{reqDto.mateId} AND responseMate=#{reqDto.userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mate (requestMate, responseMate, status) VALUES ( #{reqDto.userId}, #{reqDto.mateId}, 'n' )
mapper.update: UPDATE mate SET status = 'y' WHERE requestMate = #{reqDto.userId} AND responseMate = #{reqDto.mateId} AND status = 'n'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM mate WHERE requestMate = #{reqDto.userId} AND responseMate = #{reqDto.mateId} AND status = 'y'
